sentences.sContent: The game is played out in endless fawning speeches, flattering remarks and fake smiles.
sentences.sContent_eng: The game is played out in endless fawning speeches, flattering remarks and fake smiles.
sentences.sCn: 于是 这个游戏中充斥着无穷无尽的恭维式讲话、奉承式言谈和虚伪的笑容。

sentences.sContent: "You've got to try this, " he shouted to his wife, to the delight of a fawning saleswoman.
sentences.sContent_eng: "You've got to try this, " he shouted to his wife, to the delight of a fawning saleswoman.
sentences.sCn: “你来试试这个”，在销售员的奉承下，他喜出望外的朝他妻子喊道。
